class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines. However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class
course_description: The objective of this course is to prepare you to work in the areas of portfolio management, stock research and investment banking. The course is designed to improve your understanding of the fundamental concepts of security investments. The course will primarily focus on security analysis and management of stock portfolios. We will also cover fundamentals of fixed-income securities and equity options.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W330
